subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort is located in Jaipur?
question_hi: जयपुर में किस ग्रैंड के बार्मोन है।
explanation_en: Nahargarh Fort is located in Jaipur, Rajasthan. It is known for its unique architectural design and scenic beauty.
explanation_hi: नहारगढ क्षेत्र को राजस्थान में प्रतिष्ठ आकार और समुचित सेवा के लिए बना है।

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: What is the traditional dance form of Rajasthan known as?
question_hi: राजस्थान के कला स्तर क्या प्राची पूर्वागोवाद क्या है?
explanation_en: Ghoomar is a traditional folk dance form originated in Rajasthan. It is performed by women and is known for its swift turns and lively music.
explanation_hi: गोमार ये राजस्थान में आत्रिता डेंस
